pullrequest.title: add ci jobs for ignition release branches on brew and windows

content.raw:
I have the feeling that for implementing well the goal of this PR we will need to map each major branch with the different distributions that it is designed to work in its life time. We have different workarounds in place to avoid some failures but having an exact match between them would improve the current and the future situation.

In my test this PR will generate for example jobs for ign-math2 for Zesty which I'm not sure that we are interested into supporting this option.
content.html:
I have the feeling that for implementing well the goal of this PR we will need to map each major branch with the different distributions that it is designed to work in its life time. We have different workarounds in place to avoid some failures but having an exact match between them would improve the current and the future situation.

In my test this PR will generate for example jobs for ign-math2 for Zesty which I'm not sure that we are interested into supporting this option.
